en.welcome: Hello! I'm Josephine, your voice note transcription assistant. Send me a voice note, and I'll transcribe it for you!
en.processing: I'm transcribing your voice note. This will take a moment...
en.error: Sorry, I encountered an error while processing your voice note. Please try again later.
en.sendAudio: Please send a voice note for transcription.
en.fileTooBig: This voice note is too large to process. Please send a shorter message (under 45 seconds).
en.processingTimeout: This voice note is taking too long to process. Please try a shorter message or try again later.
en.rateLimited: Our service is experiencing high demand. Please try again in a few minutes.
en.apiError: Sorry, there's a temporary issue with our service. Our team has been notified.
en.needCredits: You've used all your free transcriptions. To continue using Josephine, please send Â£2 to [payment details] to get 50 more transcriptions.
